<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Please Take Care of my Pet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bitte Nehmen-Obacht meines Haustieres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">S'il vous plaît soin de prise de mon animal de 
compagnie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por favor cuidado da tomada de meu animal de 
estimação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prego cura dell'introito del mio animale 
domestico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρακαλώ φροντίστε το PET μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Por favor cuidado de la toma de mi animal 
doméstico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment, of a writing activity, where the student writes a note to his neigbour with instructions of how to care for their pet</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">instructions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammer.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung, 
einer Schreiben Aktivität, in der der Kursteilnehmer eine Anmerkung 
zu seinem neigbour mit Anweisungen schreibt von, wie man für ihr 
Haustier interessiert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation, 
d'une activité d'écriture, où l'étudiant écrit une note à son 
neigbour avec des instructions de la façon s'inquiéter de leur 
animal de compagnie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação,
de uma atividade da escrita, onde o estudante escreva uma nota a seu 
neigbour com instruções de como se importar com seu animal de 
estimação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione, 
di un'attività di scrittura, dove l'allievo scrive una nota al suo 
neigbour con le istruzioni di come preoccuparsi per il loro animale 
domestico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση, μιας 
δραστηριότητας γραψίματος, όπου ο σπουδαστής γράφει μια σημείωση
στο neigbour του με τις οδηγίες για το πώς να φροντίσει για το 
κατοικίδιο ζώο τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen, 
de una actividad de la escritura, donde el estudiante escribe una nota
a su neigbour con instrucciones de cómo cuidar para su animal 
doméstico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grammer.</string>
          </keyword>
